templateOptions.label: ConnectionSetName
templateOptions.description: The Name of the SAPConfigParameter set

templateOptions.label: HostName
templateOptions.description: The HostName of the SAP server where the SAP system in installed

templateOptions.label: SysId
templateOptions.description: The ID of the SAP system

templateOptions.label: Client
templateOptions.description: The Client of the SAP system

templateOptions.label: UserName
templateOptions.description: The UserName to connect the SAP system

templateOptions.label: Password
templateOptions.description: The Password to connect the SAP system

templateOptions.label: SAPdllDirectoryPath
templateOptions.description: The directory where the SAP connector dll's are located

templateOptions.label: FunctionCall
templateOptions.description: The name of the functionCall. This is specified within SAP. The function call must be configured to retrieve the requested data from SAP

templateOptions.label: TableName
templateOptions.description: The name of the table in which the user data is stored
